title.paragraph: Follow our footsteps an Exploration Game through Nepal, uncovering hidden photos and moments from our two-week trek as you go.

tutorial.one: This is an Exploration Game where your goal is to reveal hidden Milestones on a map to retrace our two-week trek as you go.
tutorial.two: Use your Mouse and Hold Click on the map to search for a Milestone.
tutorial.three: Scroll can be used to travel along the valley.
tutorial.four: And reveal the next Milestone of our journey.
tutorial.five: You can click on the Milestone to discover more about it! keep track your progress with your Travel log!

message.later: I can't go there yet, but I can come back later.
message.missed: I must have missed a Milestone along the way...
